archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0880
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Revenue Assurance Analyst I want be able to access all third party charges and costs so that we can confirm that all third party costs are correct and passed on to our customers so that we can understand margin at a customer level

properties.value: what is a third party in this context? Is this about IPB? Kiri: e.g. LFCs such as Chorus, or Downer etc. Those where we are on-charging customers for services (could be a direct on charge with margin which I think is IPB, but unsure if LFCs are also IPB?)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
